spells.name: The Hammer of Sigmar
spells.description: This prayer imbues the caster's weapon with holy power. The caster gains +2 Strength in close combat until the start of the next Mordheim turn.

spells.name: Hearts of Steel
spells.description: Friendly models within 8" of the caster become immune to Fear and All Alone tests until the start of the next Mordheim turn.

spells.name: Soulfire
spells.description: All enemy models within 4" of the caster suffer a Strength 3 hit. Undead and Possessed suffer a Strength 5 hit instead.

spells.name: Shield of Faith
spells.description: The caster gains a 2+ ward save against all spells and magical effects until the start of the next Mordheim turn.

spells.name: Healing Hand
spells.description: Any one model within 2" of the caster (including the caster) is restored to full Wounds. Cannot heal warriors who are out of action.

spells.name: Armour of Righteousness
spells.description: The caster gains a 2+ armour save and causes Fear until the start of the next Mordheim turn.

spells.name: Lifestealer
spells.description: The Necromancer drains the life from a target. A single enemy model within 6" suffers a wound with no armour save. The Necromancer gains +1 Wound (up to starting max).

spells.name: Re-Animation
spells.description: One zombie model that was taken out of action earlier in the game is placed back on the table within 6" of the caster with 1 Wound.

spells.name: Death Vision
spells.description: A single enemy model within 12" must pass a Leadership test or be reduced to WS 1 and BS 0 until the start of the next Mordheim turn.

spells.name: Spell of Doom
spells.description: A single enemy model within 12" suffers a Strength 5 hit. If the target is wounded, it must pass a Leadership test or be taken out of action.

spells.name: Call of Vanhel
spells.description: All undead models within 6" of the caster may immediately move 4" towards the nearest enemy (may charge). They fight an extra round of close combat if engaged.

spells.name: Spell of Awakening
spells.description: At the start of each battle, the Necromancer may summon D3 Zombies for free. They are deployed within 6" of the Necromancer.

spells.name: Lifestealer
spells.description: The caster drains the life from a target. A single enemy model within 6" suffers a wound with no armour save. The Liche gains +1 Wound (up to starting max). A Necromancer may only choose this if the Liche has Horror.

spells.name: Re-Animation
spells.description: One zombie or skeleton model that was taken out of action earlier in the game is placed back on the table within 6" of the caster with 1 Wound.

spells.name: Death Vision
spells.description: A single enemy model within 12" must pass a Leadership test or be reduced to WS 1 and BS 0 until the start of the next Mordheim turn.

spells.name: Spell of Doom
spells.description: A single enemy model within 12" suffers a Strength 5 hit. If the target is wounded, it must pass a Leadership test or be taken out of action.

spells.name: Horror
spells.description: A single enemy model within 12" must pass a Leadership test on 3D6 or flee directly away from the caster.

spells.name: Call of Vanhel
spells.description: All undead models within 6" of the caster may immediately move 4" towards the nearest enemy (may charge). They fight an extra round of close combat if engaged.

spells.name: Dark Blood
spells.description: The caster's blood turns to black ichor. Until the start of the next Mordheim turn, any model that wounds the caster in close combat suffers a S3 hit.

spells.name: Lure of Chaos
spells.description: A single enemy model within 12" must pass a Leadership test or move D6" towards the caster. If this brings the model into base contact with the caster or an ally, it counts as charging.

spells.name: Wings of Darkness
spells.description: The caster may fly up to 12" and land anywhere, ignoring terrain. The caster may charge after landing.

spells.name: Word of Pain
spells.description: A single enemy model within 12" suffers -1 to all to hit rolls (both close combat and shooting) until the start of the next Mordheim turn.

spells.name: Eye of God
spells.description: The caster gains a random mutation for the rest of the battle (roll on the Mutations table). If a 1 is rolled, the caster suffers a wound instead.

spells.name: Favour of the Gods
spells.description: The caster may re-roll all failed to hit and to wound rolls in close combat until the start of the next Mordheim turn.

spells.name: Black Fury
spells.description: The caster gains +2 Attacks and +1 Strength in close combat until the start of the next Mordheim turn.

spells.name: Gnawdoom
spells.description: A target within 8" is attacked by a swarm of ghostly rats. The target suffers 2D6 S1 hits.

spells.name: Warpfire
spells.description: A green bolt of warpfire strikes a target within 8". The target suffers a S5 hit with no armour save.

spells.name: Children of the Horned Rat
spells.description: The caster summons D3 Giant Rats at the start of each battle. They are placed within 6" of the caster.

spells.name: Sorcerer's Curse
spells.description: A single enemy model within 12" must re-roll all successful armour saves until the start of the next Mordheim turn.

spells.name: Eye of the Warp
spells.description: All enemy models within 6" of the caster must pass a Leadership test or suffer -1 to all to hit rolls until the start of the next turn.
